评论概述: Nice bag with oddly long strap.
评论详情: This bag is nice but too big to be a "crossbody" bag: the included strap is very long (even for me & I am 5'10) and also very thin for a bag of this size & weight. It makes no sense. A shorter, thicker strap would be better suited to allow it to be carried on the shoulder. So with -no- strap, it is a nice, roomy, leather handbag that looks like a classic "doctor's" bag. I will be leaving the strap off & carrying it this way.

Just inspect the bag when you receive it, look along the stitch line.. My strap came apart exactly on the stitch line. it had to be like that when I received it, I didn’t check. I don’t put much in there but wallet my keys…. just inspect it when you receive it.
Love the purse. It is a little bigger than I thought, but I love it anyway.

Quality seems okay, but it does not appear to be real leather. I was reading reviews that said it was for sure, so I made a little slice in the lining to look at the back of the outer material. It is in fact real leather. I don't know what sort of tanning process is used, but it gives the illusion and creates the behavior of faux. A conundrum to be sure.  After confirming that it IS real leather, I'm very pleased with this bag. It is spacious and seems sturdy, while not being overly large and obtrusive. Took away one star for the trouble I went through to confirm that it's genuine.
I love it. Just what I wanted.  Stellar!

There is nothing I dislike about this purse. I especially like the double zipper on top which makes it easier to open and close the bag and there is no gap between the zipper and the bag at the ends. There is an outside pocket, two inside slip pockets, and two inside zippered pockets with an open pocket between them. I use this crossbody and love the thin strap. Not only does it look better than a thick strap but I find that somehow the weight is more evenly distributed and does not weigh me down as much as a lighter purse I have with a wider strap. I have already ordered a second bag in a different color. I do wish that it would come in a lighter color like a saddle tan as the current colors are a little dark for summer.
Exactly what I was looking for.
I got this for my wife for her birthday. She absolutely loves it!
I love this satchel type bag.  All my necessities, including my iPad, fit in it with room to spare.  The leather is thin, but soft and rich- looking.
I love the style and was so anxious to receive this! When I got it, it had a small circle where the leather had no color/was damaged so back it goes! Thoroughly inspect your bag for damage.

**Update:  I purchased this in early March.  It is now April 13th, 2024.  So, I've had it just over one month.  Even though I have never used the small interior pockets, the stitching is already pulling out.  I've used this bag, (lightly), about 6 times.  This is a hard no for me, and I think it's past the time that I can return.I liked the look and the size of the bag, so I ordered.  There was a bit of a discount, so I paid around $80.00 for it.  I received the bag quickly and in perfect condition.  I like the look of the bag but there are some cons to it, imho.  I do not like how thin the leather is.  The bag is so thin and light, and the lining appears inexpensive.  I'm really not sure how well this bag is going to wear.  I may just use it as an occasional bag, beacuse I do like the shape and color.  As others have said, the shoulder strap is very thin for the size of the bag- it's unlikely that I would ever use the strap.  It did come with a dust bag, so that is a nice touch.

decided I needed a grown-up purse for special grown-up occasions LOL (I am in my 50s). I like jeans and my boho tote bag and I telework and I am sure I look insane on the rare occasion I step out but I decided maybe I would get a few grown-up things such as this purse and I am glad I did. It is made really well, it feels nice too. It is not too big, nor too small, and it's a style that is always in style. So owning it already makes me feel so fancy. That's obviously the most expensive purse I own but it seems, based on the quality, to be worth it. This might be the only real purse I own for another 20 years and I am comfortable that it will hold up.

I have been looking for a bag compatiable to the one that I carried for years. I have put tape on my bag, it has wear around the edges, but I loved it. I actually looked at, wait for it, over 1500 pocketbooks, but nothing came close to the one that i carried except this on.. You have to understand me, I can't just carry any bag, it has to be just the right lenght(13 to 14) inches, it can't have a divided middle, has to have outside zip up pocket with one in the inside also. I don't like decorations on my bag, no silver/gold buckles, no tassels, no two toned material, no crocodile, no shiny material, no initials, no designer's name on bag. This one suits me just fine and I am going to call to see if it comes in gray..also, it has to be short handled, if straps come with bag, I don't use them...It's the Iswee satchael tote bag......
